name: Colorful Ensalada
description: This Colorful Ensalada is a vibrant, healthy meal perfect for anyone looking to enjoy a low-carb, low-sodium, and low-sugar option. Bursting with the fresh flavors of tomatoes, bell peppers, and a tangy lemon dressing, it's a delicious way to enjoy Healthyfied Recipes!

recipeInstructions.text: Begin by juicing the lemon until you have the required amount of lemon juice.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: Chop the tomatoes, yellow bell pepper, green capsicum, and red onion into small, bite-sized pieces.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: In a large mixing bowl, combine the chopped tomatoes, yellow bell pepper, green capsicum, red onion, and minced garlic.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4

recipeInstructions.text: Add the lemon juice and black pepper to the bowl. Toss all ingredients until they are well mixed and evenly coated with the dressing.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 5
